<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- lib/CodeGen/MachineTraceMetrics.h - Super-scalar metrics -&#42;- C++ -&#42;-===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file defines the interface for the MachineTraceMetrics analysis pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that estimates CPU resource usage and critical data dependency paths through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preferred traces. This is useful for super-scalar CPUs where execution speed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be limited both by data dependencies and by limited execution resources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Out-of-order CPUs will often be executing instructions from multiple basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks at the same time. This makes it difficult to estimate the resource</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// usage accurately in a single basic block. Resources can be estimated better</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by looking at a trace through the current basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For every block, the MachineTraceMetrics pass will pick a preferred trace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that passes through the block. The trace is chosen based on loop structure,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch probabilities, and resource usage. The intention is to pick likely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// traces that would be the most affected by code transformations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is expensive to compute a full arbitrary trace for every block, so to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// save some computations, traces are chosen to be convergent. This means that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the traces through basic blocks A and B ever cross when moving away from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A and B, they never diverge again. This applies in both directions - If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// traces meet above A and B, they won&#39;t diverge when going further back.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traces tend to align with loops. The trace through a block in an inner loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will begin at the loop entry block and end at a back edge. If there are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nested loops, the trace may begin and end at those instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each trace, we compute the critical path length, which is the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cycles required to execute the trace when execution is limited by data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependencies only. We also compute the resource height, which is the number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of cycles required to execute all instructions in the trace when ignoring</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data dependencies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Every instruction in the current block has a slack - the number of cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// execution of the instruction can be delayed without extending the critical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;MACHINETRACEMETRICS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;MACHINETRACEMETRICS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Returns true if the height resources have been computed from the trace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// below this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad636cb57c36fe3c776bb458c552435ac"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad636cb57c36fe3c776bb458c552435ac">hasValidHeight</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a2bee15b953c70ea17198d4d8b60aefed">InstrHeight</a> != ~0u; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Invalidate depth resources when some block above this one has changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a145c87332fff3323e335d8f6152ccbcf"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a145c87332fff3323e335d8f6152ccbcf">invalidateDepth</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a05783617bfead544a66a41fb304756f2">InstrDepth</a> = ~0u; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad5da517ffd94fcc2e20eb76b6abbac50">HasValidInstrDepths</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Invalidate height resources when a block below this one has changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#aad9695c85c7fa313de163b67ae910b85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#aad9695c85c7fa313de163b67ae910b85">invalidateHeight</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a2bee15b953c70ea17198d4d8b60aefed">InstrHeight</a> = ~0u; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#afc720e9e0f5863604b694be0b991b7a8">HasValidInstrHeights</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Assuming that this is a dominator of TBI, determine if it contains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// useful instruction depths. A dominating block can be above the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// trace head, and any dependencies from such a far away dominator are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// expected to affect the critical path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Also returns true when TBI == this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#aa1cb1af6ccc2e3907a5c11eab0a850a3"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#aa1cb1af6ccc2e3907a5c11eab0a850a3">isUsefulDominator</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#aa15568fb019e0aebba9ff16aeca2edbb">TraceBlockInfo</a> &amp;TBI)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The trace for TBI may not even be calculated yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a8e39c65ba3a21fb041f682ab7b2be929">hasValidDepth</a>() || !TBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a8e39c65ba3a21fb041f682ab7b2be929">hasValidDepth</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instruction depths are only comparable if the traces share a head.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad1289df76629f404936fc8b2df1a6934">Head</a> != TBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad1289df76629f404936fc8b2df1a6934">Head</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is almost always the case that TBI belongs to the same trace as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this block, but rare convoluted cases involving irreducible control</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flow, a dominator may share a trace head without actually being on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same trace as TBI. This is not a big problem as long as it doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase the instruction depth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad5da517ffd94fcc2e20eb76b6abbac50">HasValidInstrDepths</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a05783617bfead544a66a41fb304756f2">InstrDepth</a> &lt;= TBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a05783617bfead544a66a41fb304756f2">InstrDepth</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Data-dependency-related information. Per-instruction depth and height</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are computed from data dependencies in the current trace, using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// itinerary data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Instruction depths have been computed. This implies hasValidDepth().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad5da517ffd94fcc2e20eb76b6abbac50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ad5da517ffd94fcc2e20eb76b6abbac50">HasValidInstrDepths</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Instruction heights have been computed. This implies hasValidHeight().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#afc720e9e0f5863604b694be0b991b7a8"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#afc720e9e0f5863604b694be0b991b7a8">HasValidInstrHeights</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Critical path length. This is the number of cycles in the longest data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// dependency chain through the trace. This is only valid when both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// HasValidInstrDepths and HasValidInstrHeights are set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ac29f5e22ff084751af77306d30e2b437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ac29f5e22ff084751af77306d30e2b437">CriticalPath</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Live-in registers. These registers are defined above the current block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// and used by this block or a block below it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This does not include PHI uses in the current block, but it does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// include PHI uses in deeper blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a31a27d3966568ca13e2248fe0faf4080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;LiveInReg, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#a31a27d3966568ca13e2248fe0faf4080">LiveIns</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/traceblockinfo/#ac780f9f109c83bd4d8654a6394260030">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>&amp;) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// InstrCycles represents the cycle height and depth of an instruction in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// trace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles">InstrCycles</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Earliest issue cycle as determined by data dependencies and instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// latencies from the beginning of the trace. Data dependencies from</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles/#aecec30fb7bb36797ee2c01f1c977a4b9"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles/#aecec30fb7bb36797ee2c01f1c977a4b9">Depth</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Minimum number of cycles from this instruction is issued to the of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// trace, as determined by data dependencies and instruction latencies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles/#a71f86c7e329271a09b14d04a1153cb46"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles/#a71f86c7e329271a09b14d04a1153cb46">Height</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A trace represents a plausible sequence of executed basic blocks that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// passes through the current basic block one. The Trace class serves as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// handle to internal cached data structures.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#a69dedf77b4f2d2678bb731185a5e0809">Trace</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/ensemble">Ensemble</a> &amp;TE;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#adba3d4b38d46a1c9d4ca1168326a408c">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>&amp;) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Compute the total number of instructions in the trace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#a0c25745dee731181fe4ba897525a69a8"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#a0c25745dee731181fe4ba897525a69a8">getInstrCount</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TBI.InstrDepth + TBI.InstrHeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return the resource depth of the top/bottom of the trace center block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This is the number of cycles required to execute all instructions from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the trace head to the trace center block. The resource depth only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// considers execution resources, it ignores data dependencies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// When Bottom is set, instructions in the trace center block are included.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#ade9b053c3235bc1f054a7086bf1c5551">getResourceDepth</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bottom) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return the resource length of the trace. This is the number of cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// required to execute the instructions in the trace if they were all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// independent, exposing the maximum instruction-level parallelism.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Any blocks in Extrablocks are included as if they were part of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// trace. Likewise, extra resources required by the specified scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// classes are included. For the caller to account for extra machine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// instructions, it must first resolve each instruction&#39;s scheduling class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#a3bab5c2e4f0b9a464665f79677b7f7e7">getResourceLength</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;const MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Extrablocks = &#123;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;const MCSchedClassDesc &#42;&gt;</a> ExtraInstrs = &#123;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;const MCSchedClassDesc &#42;&gt;</a> RemoveInstrs = &#123;&#125;) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Invalidate cached information about MBB. This must be called &#42;before&#42; MBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is erased, or the CFG is otherwise changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This invalidates per-block information about resource usage for MBB only,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;FixedBlockInfo, 4&gt;</a> BlockInfo;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cycles consumed on each processor resource per block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of processor resource kinds is constant for a given subtarget,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but it is not known at compile time. The number of cycles consumed by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block B on processor resource R is at ProcReleaseAtCycles&#91;B&#42;Kinds + R&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where Kinds = SchedModel.getNumProcResourceKinds().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 0&gt;</a> ProcReleaseAtCycles;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert scaled resource usage to a cycle count that can be compared with</span></CodeLine>
